00026 #ifndef GRADIENTRENDERER_H
00027 #define GRADIENTRENDERER_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePrerequisites.h"
00030 #include "NoiseColourValue.h"
00031 #include "NoiseImage.h"
00032 #include "NoiseBuilders.h"
00033 #include "NoiseJobQueue.h"
00034 
00035 namespace noisepp
00036 {
00037 namespace utils
00038 {
00039 
00041 class GradientRenderer
00042 {
00043         public:
00045                 GradientRenderer();
00049                 void addGradient (Real value, const ColourValue &color);
00054                 void renderImage (Image &image, const Real *data, JobQueue *jobQueue=0);
00056                 void setCallback (BuilderCallback *callback);
00058                 ~GradientRenderer();
00059         protected:
00060         private:
00061                 struct Gradient
00062                 {
00063                         Real value;
00064                         ColourValue color;
00065                         bool operator< (const Gradient &g) const
00066                         {
00067                                 return (value < g.value);
00068                         }
00069                 };
00070                 typedef std::vector<Gradient> GradientVector;
00071                 GradientVector mGradients;
00072                 BuilderCallback *mCallback;
00073                 class GradientRendererJob : public Job
00074                 {
00075                         private:
00076                                 GradientRenderer *renderer;
00077                                 int width;
00078                                 const Real *data;
00079                                 unsigned char *buffer;
00080 
00081                         public:
00082                                 GradientRendererJob(GradientRenderer *renderer, int width, const Real *data, unsigned char *buffer);
00083                                 void execute ();
00084                                 void finish ();
00085                 };
00086 };
00087 
00088 };
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif // GRADIENTRENDERER_H
